verses.verse: And Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun <S%H5126><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> out of <S%H4480><s%> Shittim <S%H7851><s%> two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H376><s%> to spy <S%H7270><s%> secretly, <S%H2791><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Go <S%H1980><s%> view <S%H7200><s%> <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> even Jericho. <S%H3405><s%> And they went, <S%H1980><s%> and came into <S%H935><s%> a harlot's <S%H802><s%> <S%H2181><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> named <S%H8034><s%> Rahab, <S%H7343><s%> and lodged <S%H7901><s%> there. <S%H8033><s%>

And it was told <S%H559><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> there came <S%H935><s%> men <S%H376><s%> in hither <S%H2008><s%> tonight <S%H3915><s%> of the children <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> to search out <S%H2658><s%> <S%H853><s%> the country. <S%H776><s%>

And the king <S%H4428><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> sent <S%H7971><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Rahab, <S%H7343><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Bring forth <S%H3318><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> that are come <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> thee, which <S%H834><s%> are entered <S%H935><s%> into thine house: <S%H1004><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they be come <S%H935><s%> to search out <S%H2658><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the country. <S%H776><s%>

And the woman <S%H802><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> the two <S%H8147><s%> men, <S%H376><s%> and hid <S%H6845><s%> them, and said <S%H559><s%> thus, <S%H3651><s%> There came <S%H935><s%> men <S%H376><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> me, but I knew <S%H3045><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> whence <S%H4480><s%> <S%H370><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> were:

And it came to pass <S%H1961><s%> about the time of shutting <S%H5462><s%> of the gate, <S%H8179><s%> when it was dark, <S%H2822><s%> that the men <S%H376><s%> went out: <S%H3318><s%> whither <S%H575><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> not: <S%H3808><s%> pursue <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them quickly; <S%H4118><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> ye shall overtake <S%H5381><s%> them.

But she <S%H1931><s%> had brought them up <S%H5927><s%> to the roof <S%H1406><s%> of the house, and hid <S%H2934><s%> them with the stalks <S%H6086><s%> of flax, <S%H6593><s%> which she had laid in order <S%H6186><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the roof. <S%H1406><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them the way <S%H1870><s%> to Jordan <S%H3383><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> the fords: <S%H4569><s%> and as soon as <S%H310><s%> <S%H834><s%> they which pursued <S%H7291><s%> after <S%H310><s%> them were gone out, <S%H3318><s%> they shut <S%H5462><s%> the gate. <S%H8179><s%>
And before <S%H2962><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> were laid down, <S%H7901><s%> she <S%H1931><s%> came up <S%H5927><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> them upon <S%H5921><s%> the roof; <S%H1406><s%>

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the men, <S%H376><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> you <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> and that <S%H3588><s%> your terror <S%H367><s%> is fallen <S%H5307><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> us, and that <S%H3588><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> faint <S%H4127><s%> because of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you.

For <S%H3588><s%> we have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> how <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> dried up <S%H3001><s%> <S%H853><s%> the water <S%H4325><s%> of the Red <S%H5488><s%> sea <S%H3220><s%> for <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you, when ye came out <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4714><s%> and what <S%H834><s%> ye did <S%H6213><s%> unto the two <S%H8147><s%> kings <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> that <S%H834><s%> were on the other side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> Sihon <S%H5511><s%> and Og, <S%H5747><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> ye utterly destroyed. <S%H2763><s%> <S%H853><s%>

And as soon as we had heard <S%H8085><s%> these things, our hearts <S%H3824><s%> did melt, <S%H4549><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> did there remain <S%H6965><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> courage <S%H7307><s%> in any man <S%H376><s%> because of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you: for <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> is God <S%H430><s%> in heaven <S%H8064><s%> above, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4605><s%> and in <S%H5921><s%> earth <S%H776><s%> beneath. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H8478><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore, I pray <S%H4994><s%> you, swear <S%H7650><s%> unto me by the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> since <S%H3588><s%> I have showed you kindness, <S%H6213><s%> <S%H5973><s%> <S%H2617><s%> that ye <S%H859><s%> will also <S%H1571><s%> show <S%H6213><s%> kindness <S%H2617><s%> unto <S%H5973><s%> my father's <S%H1><s%> house, <S%H1004><s%> and give <S%H5414><s%> me a true <S%H571><s%> token: <S%H226><s%>

And that ye will save alive <S%H2421><s%> <S%H853><s%> my father, <S%H1><s%> and my mother, <S%H517><s%> and my brethren, <S%H251><s%> and my sisters, <S%H269><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> they have, and deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H853><s%> our lives <S%H5315><s%> from death. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4194><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> answered <S%H559><s%> her, Our life <S%H5315><s%> for <S%H8478><s%> yours, if <S%H518><s%> ye utter <S%H5046><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> our business. <S%H1697><s%> And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> when the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath given <S%H5414><s%> us <S%H853><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> that we will deal <S%H6213><s%> kindly <S%H2617><s%> and truly <S%H571><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> thee.

Then she let them down <S%H3381><s%> by a cord <S%H2256><s%> through <S%H1157><s%> the window: <S%H2474><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> her house <S%H1004><s%> was upon the town <S%H2346><s%> wall, <S%H7023><s%> and she <S%H1931><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> upon the wall. <S%H2346><s%>

And she said <S%H559><s%> unto them, Get <S%H1980><s%> you to the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> meet <S%H6293><s%> you; and hide yourselves <S%H2247><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> be returned: <S%H7725><s%> and afterward <S%H310><s%> may ye go <S%H1980><s%> your way. <S%H1870><s%>

And the men <S%H376><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her, We <S%H587><s%> will be blameless <S%H5355><s%> of this thine oath <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7621><s%> <S%H2088><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast made us swear. <S%H7650><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> when we <S%H587><s%> come <S%H935><s%> into the land, <S%H776><s%> thou shalt bind <S%H7194><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> line <S%H8615><s%> of scarlet <S%H8144><s%> thread <S%H2339><s%> in the window <S%H2474><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou didst let us down <S%H3381><s%> by: and thou shalt bring <S%H622><s%> thy father, <S%H1><s%> and thy mother, <S%H517><s%> and thy brethren, <S%H251><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> thy father's <S%H1><s%> household, <S%H1004><s%> home <S%H1004><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> thee.

And it shall be, <S%H1961><s%> that whosoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> shall go out <S%H3318><s%> of the doors <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1817><s%> of thy house <S%H1004><s%> into the street, <S%H2351><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be upon his head, <S%H7218><s%> and we <S%H587><s%> will be guiltless: <S%H5355><s%> and whosoever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> shall be <S%H1961><s%> with <S%H854><s%> thee in the house, <S%H1004><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> shall be on our head, <S%H7218><s%> if <S%H518><s%> any hand <S%H3027><s%> be <S%H1961><s%> upon him.

And if <S%H518><s%> thou utter <S%H5046><s%> <S%H853><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> our business, <S%H1697><s%> then we will be <S%H1961><s%> quit <S%H5355><s%> of thine oath <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7621><s%> which <S%H834><s%> thou hast made us to swear. <S%H7650><s%>

And she said, <S%H559><s%> According unto your words, <S%H1697><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> be it. <S%H1931><s%> And she sent them away, <S%H7971><s%> and they departed: <S%H1980><s%> and she bound <S%H7194><s%> <S%H853><s%> the scarlet <S%H8144><s%> line <S%H8615><s%> in the window. <S%H2474><s%>

And they went, <S%H1980><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> unto the mountain, <S%H2022><s%> and abode <S%H3427><s%> there <S%H8033><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> days, <S%H3117><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> were returned: <S%H7725><s%> and the pursuers <S%H7291><s%> sought <S%H1245><s%> them throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the way, <S%H1870><s%> but found <S%H4672><s%> them not. <S%H3808><s%>

So the two <S%H8147><s%> men <S%H376><s%> returned, <S%H7725><s%> and descended <S%H3381><s%> from the mountain, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H2022><s%> and passed over, <S%H5674><s%> and came <S%H935><s%> to <S%H413><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and told <S%H5608><s%> him <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> things that befell <S%H4672><s%> them:

And they said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> Truly <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath delivered <S%H5414><s%> into our hands <S%H3027><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land; <S%H776><s%> for even <S%H1571><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%> do faint <S%H4127><s%> because of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> us.
